title: HELP ME
body:
Hi i have a question, i was baned recenlty i mean like 4 months ago so i lost my rank and lvl. idk how meany games i played i came to lvl 0 does banned people say forever in lvl 0 or something? cuz im dessprete while im lvl 0 i always get the bad team while other team is like plat gold and my team is like bronz so is im asking how to get my lvl up i pretty much tryed everything i was nice i stop beign riggered every game so people i need opinons 
ps: bad grammer

replies.body: You definitely won't stay at 0 honor forever! After getting dropped down in honor, you simply need to keep playing "honorable" games (without anything that would deserve a punishment) and get honored by teammates. There isn't a set amount of time, but after you've shown the system that you've reformed your honor will start to rise again.

Your Honor has nothing to do about who you get teamed up with. It has no effect on the matchmaking system at all.

You will gain honor by your teammates "honoring" you in the post game screen, which means you have to change your attitude, be less toxic and be helpful towards your team so you can get your honor level back up.
